sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Form extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { digiteAlgo: '', nome: '', idade: 0, estado: '', moradia: false, } this.handleGenerico = this.handleGenerico.bind(this) } handleGenerico ({ target }) { const { name } = target; const value = target.type === 'checked' ? target.checked : target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value, }) } render() { return (
